Package com.github.yellowstonegames.text

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    Language
    A text generator for producing sentences and/or words in nonsense languages that fit a theme.
    Language.Alteration  
    Language.Modifier  
    Language.SentenceForm
    A simple way to bundle a Language with the arguments that would be passed to it when calling Language.sentence(LaserRandom, int, int, String[], String[], double, int) or one of its overloads.
    TextTools
    Various utility functions for handling readable natural-language text.
